scripts.test: eslint js/id && phantomjs node_modules/mocha-phantomjs-core/mocha-phantomjs-core.js test/index.html dot && make && phantomjs node_modules/mocha-phantomjs-core/mocha-phantomjs-core.js test/index_packaged.html dot
scripts.build:svg: npm run build:maki_sprite && npm run build:spriteify && npm run build:svg_sprite
scripts.build:iD: cat $npm_package_config_iD_files data/data.js > dist/iD.js && uglifyjs dist/iD.js -c -m -o dist/iD.min.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:css && npm run build:svg && npm run build:js && npm run build:iD

config.d3_files: node_modules/d3/src/start.js node_modules/d3/src/arrays/index.js node_modules/d3/src/behavior/behavior.js node_modules/d3/src/behavior/zoom.js node_modules/d3/src/core/index.js node_modules/d3/src/event/index.js node_modules/d3/src/geo/length.js node_modules/d3/src/geo/mercator.js node_modules/d3/src/geo/path.js node_modules/d3/src/geo/stream.js node_modules/d3/src/geom/polygon.js node_modules/d3/src/geom/hull.js node_modules/d3/src/selection/index.js node_modules/d3/src/transition/index.js node_modules/d3/src/xhr/index.js node_modules/d3/src/end.js
